00036 DropTableDispatchHandler::DropTableDispatchHandler(const TableIdentifier &table, Comm *comm, time_t timeout) : m_outstanding(0), m_client(comm, timeout), m_table_name(table.name) {
00037   memcpy(&m_table, &table, sizeof(TableIdentifier));
00038   m_table.name = m_table_name.c_str();
00039   return;
00040 }

00047 void DropTableDispatchHandler::add(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00048   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00049 
00050   try {
00051     m_client.drop_table(addr, m_table, this);
00052     m_outstanding++;
00053   }
00054   catch (Exception &e) {
00055     ErrorResult result;
00056     result.addr = addr;
00057     result.error = e.code();
00058     result.msg = "Send error";
00059     m_errors.push_back(result);
00060   }
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 
00068 void DropTableDispatchHandler::handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00069   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00070   ErrorResult result;
00071 
00072   if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00073     if ((result.error = Protocol::response_code(event_ptr)) != Error::OK) {
00074       result.addr = event_ptr->addr;
00075       result.msg = Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr);
00076       m_errors.push_back(result);
00077     }
00078   }
00079   else {
00080     result.error = event_ptr->error;
00081     result.addr = event_ptr->addr;
00082     result.msg = "";
00083     m_errors.push_back(result);
00084   }
00085   m_outstanding--;
00086   if (m_outstanding == 0)
00087     m_cond.notify_all();
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00094 bool DropTableDispatchHandler::wait_for_completion() {
00095   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00096   while (m_outstanding > 0)
00097     m_cond.wait(lock);
00098   return m_errors.empty();
00099 }

00101 
00105 void DropTableDispatchHandler::get_errors(std::vector<ErrorResult> &errors) {
00106   errors = m_errors;
00107 }
